thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 2 of 178
thread.title: Candice Streeter-Jewitt

author: Candice Streeter-Jewitt
title: Candice Streeter-Jewitt
text:
We have just used Trusted House Sitters for the first time. It was a leap of faith to leave your pets and home in the hands of strangers - but having had less than good service from an expensive agency we decided to give it a go.
Best decision we ever made, our dogs loved the sitters and the house was in good order when we returned. We will definitely be using them again. The website was easy to use and gave us confidence that the sitters were reliable.
